text: Litoria pallidofemora is a tree frog from Papua New Guinea. Scientists disagree about whether this frog is really in the genus Nyctimystes or the genus Litoria. This frog has green coloring on the inside of its mouth. Scientists say it is related to the northern New Guinea tree frog, Litoria graminea. ==References== Category:Frogs of Oceania
title: Litoria pallidofemora
